title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that a user can register with a valid email and password, receive an email verification link, and successfully verify their email to activate the account.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter a valid email address and strong password
Submit the registration form
Verify a verification email is sent to the provided email
Click on the verification link within the email
Confirm the email is successfully verified and user account is activated
Attempt to login with verified credentials
Login is successful

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Ensure that a user can request a password reset, receive a reset email, and successfully update their password.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page
Enter registered email address and submit request
Verify a password reset email is sent
Click the password reset link in the email
Enter a new valid password and confirm
Submit the new password
Confirm password reset success message
Login with the new password
Login is successful with the updated password

title: Basic QR Code Generation with Customization
description: Test that anonymous and authenticated users can create static QR codes with color, size, logo, format, dot types, and corner styles customizations.

steps.description: Access the QR code generation interface
Choose static QR code mode
Customize color, size, dot types, corner styles, and upload a logo
Generate the QR code
Verify the QR code is displayed with the selected customizations
Download the QR code in multiple supported file formats (PNG, SVG)
Downloaded QR code matches the generated preview

title: Advanced QR Code Generation with Templates and Effects
description: Validate that authenticated users can create advanced QR codes with templates, gradients, shapes, frames, stickers, effects, and watermark overlays applied correctly.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the advanced QR code generation page
Select advanced QR code mode
Apply templates, gradients, shapes, frames, stickers, and watermark overlays
Generate the advanced QR code
Verify the QR code visually reflects all applied styles and overlays
Download the generated QR code
Downloaded file contains all advanced styling elements

title: Dynamic QR Code Creation and Target URL Update
description: Verify creation of dynamic QR codes with editable destination URLs that can be updated after generation, along with expiration and scan limit enforcement.

steps.description: Login and access dynamic QR code creation interface
Create a dynamic QR code with a target URL, expiration date in future, and scan limit
Dynamic QR code is generated successfully
Update the target URL to a different valid URL
Confirm the updated URL is applied and reflected on scan
Scan the QR code the allowed number of times
QR code stops redirecting after scan limit is reached
Simulate date past expiration date
QR code redirect is disabled due to expiration

title: Scan Analytics Data Capturing and Dashboard Visualization
description: Confirm that scanning a QR code logs accurate device/browser data, geolocation, and timestamps, and this analytic data is correctly displayed in the user's dashboard.

steps.description: Scan a dynamic QR code with different devices, browsers, and IP locations
Verify scan data like timestamps, device types, browser info, and geolocation are logged correctly
Login and navigate to the analytics dashboard
Verify scan analytics visualizations display accurate and updated stats
Verify filtering and breakdown by device, location, and time range work correctly

title: Logo Upload and Image Optimization in QR Codes
description: Verify that users can upload logos/images, which are validated, optimized, and embedded properly in QR codes.

steps.description: Login and navigate to logo upload section
Upload supported image files (PNG, JPG, SVG) within size limits
Confirm image validation success and optimized image storage
Generate a QR code embedding the uploaded logo
Verify QR code embeds the optimized logo correctly
Attempt to upload unsupported or oversized image
Error message is shown and upload is rejected

title: Razorpay Payment Processing and Subscription Management
description: Test payment workflow integration with Razorpay including purchasing credits, subscription activation, invoice generation, and handling billing enforcement.

steps.description: Login and navigate to billing page
Select a subscription plan and proceed to payment
Complete payment using Razorpay test gateway
Confirm payment status is successful and subscription is activated
Access invoice history
Verify invoices are listed and downloadable
Simulate payment failure or cancellation
Verify appropriate error is shown and subscription is not activated
Test billing enforcement by exhausting credits
Access is restricted if no active subscription or credits remain

title: API Key Generation, Rotation and Usage Tracking
description: Verify users can generate API keys, rotate them securely, and that usage statistics are tracked and displayed.

steps.description: Login and navigate to API keys management page
Generate a new API key
New API key is created and displayed securely
Rotate an existing API key
Old key is invalidated and new key is shown
Make API calls using the key
Usage statistics update correctly in the dashboard
Attempt API calls with an invalid or rotated-out key
API requests are rejected with authentication errors

title: Organization Management and Role-Based Access Control
description: Test creating organizations, inviting members, assigning roles, and enforcing role permissions on QR code and dashboard management.

steps.description: Login as organization admin and create an organization
Invite new members via email with different roles
Invited members receive invitation and can accept
Verify members can only perform CRUD operations permitted by their role
Verify team QR codes and analytics are accessible appropriately
Attempt unauthorized actions as lower role members
Access is denied or forbidden as per RBAC rules

title: Custom Domain Setup with DNS Verification and SSL Management
description: Validate users can configure custom domains with successful DNS verification, SSL certificate issuance, and confirm correct domain routing for QR code URLs.

steps.description: Login and navigate to custom domain configuration
Add a new custom domain and receive DNS verification records
Simulate DNS record addition and verify the domain
Domain verification completes successfully
SSL certificate is generated and applied
Generate a QR code using the custom domain routing
Accessing the QR code URL routes correctly using the custom domain
Test domain verification failure with incorrect DNS setup
Appropriate failure or warning message is displayed

title: Webhook Creation, Event Delivery, and Status Logging
description: Ensure users can create webhooks to receive QR code scan events, that events are delivered reliably, and delivery statuses are logged accurately.

steps.description: Login and navigate to webhook management
Create a webhook endpoint for scan events
Webhook is saved with correct settings
Trigger QR code scans that generate events
Webhook endpoint receives scan events
Simulate webhook delivery failures
Delivery retry attempts are made and failure statuses logged
View webhook delivery logs
Logs accurately reflect event timestamps, statuses, and errors

title: Notification Preferences and Delivery
description: Verify that users can configure in-app and email notification preferences, receive notifications accordingly, and digest emails are delivered without duplication or misses.

steps.description: Login and open notification settings
Toggle preferences for in-app alerts, email notifications, and digest frequency
Preferences are saved successfully
Perform actions triggering notifications (e.g., QR code scanned, billing event)
Notifications are received as per preferences
Verify no duplicate notifications are sent
Verify digest emails contain aggregated notifications and are sent on schedule

title: Rate Limiting and Security Controls on API Endpoints
description: Confirm that API endpoints enforce rate limits properly without blocking legitimate users and include security measures like CSRF protection and security headers.

steps.description: Send requests within allowed rate limits to various API endpoints
Requests succeed without blocking
Exceed rate limits by sending a high volume of requests rapidly
Excess requests are blocked with appropriate error messages
Check API requests for presence of CSRF tokens
CSRF token validation passes for valid tokens and blocks invalid/missing tokens
Inspect response headers for security headers (e.g., Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options)
Security headers are present as configured

title: Admin Console User Impersonation and Billing Adjustments
description: Test that administrators can impersonate users, access their dashboard, and perform billing adjustments or refunds using the admin console.

steps.description: Login to admin console with admin privileges
Search and select a user account
Impersonate the user and verify access to their dashboard and features
Impersonation session is established securely and can be terminated
Perform a billing adjustment or refund on the selected user
Billing status updates accordingly and logs entry in audit log
Logout from impersonation and admin console
Sessions are terminated cleanly and securely

title: Internationalization and Language Translation
description: Verify that the application supports multiple languages and displays accurate translations based on user locale settings.

steps.description: Change user locale/language preference to supported languages
UI text, labels, and messages update accordingly
Navigate through key pages like homepage, dashboard, QR code generation, billing, and settings
All key content is translated accurately with no missing or garbled text
Fallback to default language when translation is missing
Missing translations gracefully fallback without errors

title: Bulk QR Code Generation and Export
description: Test that users can perform bulk generation of QR codes, export them in batches, and use streaming export features without performance degradation.

steps.description: Login and navigate to bulk operations page
Upload or specify data for batch QR code generation
Trigger bulk generation process
Bulk QR codes are generated correctly without errors
Export generated QR codes as archive or stream
Export files are complete and downloadable
Simulate large batch to test system response and timeouts
Operations complete successfully and system remains responsive

title: Performance and Reliability under Load with Retry and Caching
description: Validate that the platform maintains responsiveness under simulated load conditions using retry logic, timeout handling, optimistic UI updates, and caching strategies.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent users performing QR code generation and API requests
Application remains responsive and does not crash
Introduce transient failures in upstream services
Retry logic triggers and recovers requests automatically
Monitor UI for optimistic updates during network latency
UI updates optimistically and reverts or confirms based on server response
Access cached data and verify stale data expiration and refresh
Cached items serve fast responses and refresh properly without errors

title: Observability and Monitoring Integration
description: Confirm Sentry error tracking, metrics collection, logging, and web vitals monitoring are functional and report accurate data for ongoing observability.

steps.description: Trigger controlled errors and exceptions in the application
Errors appear in Sentry dashboard with correct metadata
Generate user actions and API calls to create metrics and logs
Metrics are logged and displayed correctly
Verify web vitals data collection during page loads
Web vitals metrics are captured and stored for analysis
